mapper.sql: s_information.id, s_information.informationid, s_information.name, s_information.shortname, s_information.userid, s_information.pic, s_information.typeid, s_information.typename, s_information.content, s_information.summary, s_information.price, s_information.important, s_information.status, s_information.createtime

select.if:
select from s_informationtype informationtype, s_information information
and informationtype.informationtypeid = information.typeid and information.informationid = #{value}

update.if: update s_information set status = #{status} where informationid = #{informationid}

mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.nickname, b.avatar FROM s_information a, s_user b where a.userid = b.userid and a.status != 9 AND a.status=#{status} AND a.${searchKey} like '%${searchValue}%' ORDER BY a.createtime ASC
